user_query: Give me the details of the asset with ID f1ff77b6-3ab4-4719-9ded-2fc7e71cff1f. Also, retrieve the details of the market that this asset belongs to.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the details of the asset specified by the asset ID.
Retrieve the details of the market that the asset belongs to. This step requires the result from Step 1 to identify the associated market.
required_inputs: associated market identifier from the asset details
